plotter.py¶

Contains functions to help plot (or otherwise export) data.

ncsd_python.plot_modules.plotter.matplotlib_plot(input_data, save_dir)¶

makes a matplotlib style plot of our data

ncsd_python.plot_modules.plotter.write_csv(input_data, save_dir)¶

creates a csv file containing useful data, for easier parsing later

ncsd_python.plot_modules.plotter.write_xmgrace(input_data, save_dir, grace_plotter_path)¶

creates a file which can be used by xmgrace
